title: About Me
subtitle: Professional Profile
paragraph1: I'm a dedicated Backend Developer with expertise in building robust and scalable server-side applications. I specialize in Java Spring Boot, Spring Security, and DevOps architecture with a strong foundation in database optimization and web technologies.
paragraph2: My focus is on system design and microservices architecture, creating efficient and maintainable backend solutions. I'm passionate about developing secure, high-performance applications and implementing best practices in software engineering.
paragraph3: I hold a degree in Information Technology and have completed specialized training in DevOps practices, including containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code.
